name: DOASHIME-ドアを閉めるぞ
description:
◆ Game Features

・Overview
Fill three trains with animals, create chains, and aim for a high score. Animals can't board trains with station staff, so sneak past them and rush to the open doors.

・Scoring System
The more you chain animals, the higher your score. You can keep boarding animals until you run out of lives.

・Stamina System
Animals lose stamina when they touch station staff or as time passes. Chaining animals restores stamina, but as time progresses, the rate of stamina depletion increases.

・Ranking System
View global rankings online.


Supported Languages: Japanese, English

Developed by a team of four students. Game streaming is highly encouraged.

For emergencies, bugs, or inquiries, please contact us via the email address on the store page.

※ Even with supported versions, there may be instances where the game doesn't run properly due to device specifications. In such cases, we kindly ask you to proceed with Steam's refund process.
